label: joy
text: "On holiday, seeing the lanscape in Gerona."

label: guilt
text: When one of my parents insinuates something about the other (they are divorced).

label: sadness
text: When I am alone and listen to a song which I like very much and which I had listened before together with friends.

label: joy
text: I'd just got the top mark in an exam.

label: shame
text: "I remember that once, a friend did not co-operate with me due to some unavoidable reasons.  Unaware of this I treated her unjustly till I realized everything, and then I felt ashamad of my deeds. "

label: sadness
text: "I met a girl some time ago and I cared very much about her but it happened so that we left each other. I felt some sort of sadness, I think I can call it so."

label: sadness
text: A close friend died.

label: guilt
text: "When my mother found me in her bedroom ""stealing"" sugar in her bedroom.  According to our customs there comes a stage when a child stops using the parents bedroom and I was well past that age."

label: sadness
text: It was extremely sad to me when I heard that a patient who I was taking care of in hospital had passed away. He had some abdominal pains.

label: fear
text: I was camping with a friend of mine and we spent the night in the forest.  I could not fall off to sleep and could clearly hear noises from outside (steps ?) approaching our tent.

label: guilt
text: "After having told an authority figure a very large lie I was told she believed me, because she believed I had never lied to her. "

label: fear
text: "Motorcyclistic accident where for some minutes I didn't know if I was alive or dead, I remained ""cold levered"" during the situation but felt great fear."

label: sadness
text: "My grandmother died over the summer. I knew her very well, she baked great biscuits. She was in the hospital but expected to improve and go home soon. She died in her sleep."

label: sadness
text: "My grandfather was seriously ill, he had only a few days left to live. I had always loved him, but never told him. When I saw him for the last time, I had the feeling that I had omitted so many things I could not do again. - There was a fly sitting on his forehead and he was too weak to drive it away. I was very sad when I saw that."

label: shame
text: I insulted my friend for a small reason and after time I realised that I was wrong and felt ashamed; everytime I meet her I feel ashamed.

label: joy
text: Scoring a goal in football match.

label: joy
text: When I learnt that I had been accepted at UNZA.

label: anger
text: A girl entered in the division where I work and greeted everybody but not me.

label: anger
text: "A friend of mine played a joke on another friend over the telephone.  This friend, crying, called me and I got very angry and made the other person apologize."

label: anger
text: "When my brothers were being cruel to my boyfriend, because his flat-mate bent back one of my brother's fingers. It wasn't his fault."

label: guilt
text: Carried out a vandalistic act on some windows at an old army location.

label: disgust
text: "At a party I met a girl who drew me to her, told me some nonsense and always wanted to kiss me."

label: joy
text: "I wrote a difficult Exam at one time while in my Secodary School. When the results were announced on the radio, I came second out of 80 students hence I felt joy."

label: guilt
text: I refused to lend my homework to a friend.

label: guilt
text: "When I used an adjective for a person without knowing what it meant.   When I got to know the meaning, I felt guilty as it was a clear and unfair insult."

label: sadness
text: When I heard of the death of my mother.

label: sadness
text: My sister won a scholarship to Norway and it was particularly as she walked across the tarmac to get on the plane and she looked back at us.

label: joy
text: When I received my U.E. accredited as I was totally unexpecting it and I was so happy.

label: guilt
text: "When I took a car which was not mine, and suddenly it stopped working."

label: disgust
text: "When a begggar approached me for money, I felt disgusted."

label: disgust
text: At a party where the boys were telling revolting stories about the girls they'd been with.

label: anger
text: Saw in the TV South Korea cheating in the Asian Olympic games.

label: sadness
text: "My paternal grandmother had died. We weren't close but she was blood. I didn't cry but I was sad, partly due to her death and partly I think, due to the fact that I couldn't/didn't cry."

label: guilt
text: A few weeks ago I thought about an exam I had to take soon. I remembered this just before I had to go to sleep. I felt guilt because at the beginning of the year I planned to succeed.

label: sadness
text: "Enrolling at varsity, being told I couldn't get in to certain papers."

label: joy
text: "I feel joy usually after each taken exam, the last one was in February."

label: shame
text: My teacher asked me a question which I failed to answer and I was told to stay behind after the class and give the answer after studying it from a book.

label: fear
text: A letter from my boyfriend began in such a way that I thought he was going to end our relationship. I was afraid of reading the rest.

label: shame
text: When I had not done well in Geography at my MCE I was expected to get more than I did.

label: guilt
text: I had promised my friend to take her to an important appontment but I was late. So she missed the opportunity to get a wellpayed holiday job.

label: sadness
text: When my parents and sister went on a trip and I was separated from them for about three months.

label: fear
text: "My mother had fallen down from a ladder when she had been gathering cherries. Her back was hurt. Just when I arrived, I saw people of the life-saving service giving her medical care."

label: shame
text: A young visitor to the house stole money from an elderly visitor's purse. It wasn't noticed for some hours.

label: sadness
text: I saw a lot of starving people in a T.V news report.

label: shame
text: When I found out my roommate had been talking behind my back about very personal things.

label: sadness
text: When I was 10/11 years old my father travelled very much for his work (he passed three months away from home).

label: sadness
text: When my dog was stolen.

label: joy
text: "Arriving in New Zealand as a teenager - first overseas trip - something ""exhilarating"" about the change of scenery etc."

label: fear
text: "When I was curious about it and went to a spiritism session with a friend. I had already been there other times (many times when I was younger) but that day, even if I don't believe in spiritism I was terribly afraid that something would happen to me (sort of incorporation !)."

label: guilt
text: I ran over my dog with a bicycle when I was carrying him tied to the handle bar.

label: guilt
text: One day while we were strolling along the road one of my friends suggested that we go and watch a blue film.  I was curious so I went along but I felt quite guilty later.

label: shame
text: "When I lied to my girlfriend, telling her that I had passed an exam, when I actually did not even take it."

label: fear
text: I was about to begin a journey in a car with an acquaintance of mine.

label: fear
text: When thieves broke into our neighbour's house and later we heard gunshots.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty one day when I was accused of running away from classes and I was caught.

label: anger
text: "I felt much anger when my fahter interferred in my relations with another person whom I liked very much, ending something that I adored."

label: guilt
text: While quarreling with my brother I broke the glass door of the cupboard and a china doll.  We were scolded by my father for breaking the door but we did not tell him about the door.

label: guilt
text: "I felt guilty when one of my secondary teacher left me while I was in Form three, he was the only one who showed love to me."

label: sadness
text: When I was eight years old my father was run over by a car. When I saw his body I was sad beyond words.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed when my classmates discovered that I fell in love with an uneducated girl.

label: fear
text: I was alone and someone tried to break in from our back door.

label: shame
text: "A day when I was getting out of the shower I covered only the front part of my body with a towel (I was 7 years old), and I didn't see that my cousin was in the room."

label: fear
text: When my 2 year old son climbed up and sat on the 7th floor balcony with his legs hanging out.  He was holding on tightly to the upper railing of the balcony but he could have easily lost his balance when he sat down.

label: shame
text: "I was at a children's camp abroad. The people (the leaders, my coevals) were very king to us. One night we smeared our foreign friends with tooth-paste while they were sleeping and then we roused the whole camp by our shouts. Later I was so sorry. I didn't utter a word for two days, then I went to apologize."

label: fear
text: "I felt fear once, when the car in which I travelled directed towards the precipice along the road."

label: joy
text: "When my sister's first child came home, after one week in intensive care at the hospital."

label: anger
text: "This summer I got into a fight with one of our patrons (at a theatre). He hit me and I hit him and her friend, he hit my friend and we all hit eachother."

label: fear
text: When I saw a horrible movie - Alien.

label: fear
text: I bet that I would jump down from a window. I was sure that I would jump but before I did it I rather felt fear.

label: shame
text: "I talked with a man who stammered and without controlling myself, I started to talk imitating him."

label: disgust
text: When I first saw the state of a cafeteria in the grounds of the university. Due to students own lack of concern for the environment in which they eat and drink. Rubbish and spilled tea and coffee left everywhere.

label: joy
text: After the term exams I happened to meet a person that I respect and of whom I think very highly. It was nice that although we see each other rarely he had not forgotten me.

label: joy
text: "Achieving my goal at a swim meet. I worked toward the goal for 9 yrs. I was capable of achieving it, but I didn't know when."

label: sadness
text: I felt sad and depressed when I heard that our cat had died.

label: joy
text: My parents and brother came up over the weekend. We are a very close family. This was my first year away from home. They brought one jacko-lantern with a new design. That is the old joke that we have a great new design - it's always the same.

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to the Chinese universiity.

label: guilt
text: When I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting a hot pan in it.

label: shame
text: "I was jerking me off in my bedroom, when suddenly, my mother came in. She looked at me and immediately left the room."

label: guilt
text: I had spent the weekend visiting relatives and friends and didn't study for Anatomy class on Monday.

label: guilt
text: Forgot to turn up on prescribed day for jury service.

label: fear
text: "One afternoon, helping at home on the property, I was (mustering) getting in cattle and a bull turned and came for me."

label: sadness
text: When my close friend was involved in an accident and passed away instantly.  He had gone to buy a new car and had asked me to wait at his home so that I could see his new car.

label: fear
text: "When I was a kid, I always opened the door to greet my father when he came back from work.  One day it so happened that his hair was scattered due to over-crowding in the train, and when I opened the door as usual I saw something else.  I was so scared that I could not talk."

label: sadness
text: "When I found out that my girlfriend would not be coming back to UCB for one semester, but would be living in San Jose."

label: sadness
text: After my boyfriend and I had separated.

label: sadness
text: "My grandmother died, and my mother called me one sunday morning in the Autumn.  The way my mother told me about it, I hated her at that moment.  She sounded as if she had been waiting for the death of my grandmother.  I had lost a person close to me.  I felt guilty too as I had been bad to my grandmother of late.  I had not remained calm when she no longer understood everything so well."

label: sadness
text: The quarrel between my  parents.

label: fear
text: Finding out that I made a stupid mistake in the examn.

label: anger
text: My bed sheet (present of my parents) damaged by roommate.

label: shame
text: I felt very ashamed at having got a book by force from a girl.

label: guilt
text: We owned a shop and I used to serve in it occasionally. We sometimes took lollies out of the stand and Dad caught me one day.

label: joy
text: When I received the results from my final examination - Higher School Certificate - and received a mark that was beyond my wildest expectations.

label: fear
text: The exam was drawing near and I wanted to prepare for it.  But I had a lot of other things to do so I did not have much time to prepare  for the exams.  Whenever I sat down to study I was scared that I would  not be able to finish it.

label: shame
text: "I was with a group of people and everybody told me to do or say something.  It was a confusing, strong and traumatic situation for me."

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgust when I received visitors at an odd hour. I was seriously preparing for Examinations, so I did not appreciate their coming."

label: guilt
text: When my friend was punished for something that I had done.

label: shame
text: "At the funeral of my uncle, I was one of the bearers.  I was not familiar with the etiquette and acted tactlessly because of my ignorance."

label: sadness
text: When another fellow worker decided to leave the company. We had been very close and we would not be able to work with eachother any longer.

label: fear
text: "When I was the first to arrive at the scene after an accident, and found that a close school friend had been killed."

label: anger
text: "During the Christmas holdidays I wanted to invite my brother, his girlfriend and their child for dinner. When I said to my brother's girlfriend that I would like them to come at my place for dinner, she refused and never mentioned it again as if I had never asked her."

label: sadness
text: My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few months ago. This made me very sad.

label: guilt
text: "I went to the cinema with my friends, without telling my mother about it as I had been to the cinema the day before also.  When she asked me where I had been, I lied."

label: sadness
text: When my father a 4th/5th generation colonial (from Eng.) attacked me verbally about my chosen partner. A man whom he discarded because his colour skin was not white. His ultimate disgust saddned me.

label: anger
text: "With the job appointments committee when the headmaster in charge explained that a male teacher was more suitable for the particular post.  I had more years of service than the male teacher, but this was not taken into consideration.  I could have been given a less attractive job if things had gone the way the headmaster wanted."

label: guilt
text: I joked with an unfamiliar friend in an obstinate tone.  I was afraid of his misunderstanding me and being hurt and angry at me.  I felt sorry over my conduct and thought that I had to find an opportunity to apologize.

label: guilt
text: "Some boys talking about nicknames of the lecturers, and I was too afraid of them to stop them."

label: disgust
text: I was very disgusted the first day I went to put a dead body in the Mortuary. There were many dead bodies and some were uncovered so we had to put on top of the other bodies.

label: joy
text: Hearing my girlfriend accept my offer of marriage.

label: guilt
text: When I shoplifted a pair of earrings from Coles and my Mum caught me with them in my bag.

label: sadness
text: "After blowing up and saying all the wrong things, I realized what I had done and hurt that person and myself."

label: disgust
text: "I heard somebody talk about studies in a highly enthusiastic ""student-like"" way."

label: anger
text: "My classmate used her personal relations to get a seat for a subject that I wanted also.  I had taken the pains to help him apply and I did not get selected.  I did not like this as he had not told me the facts earlier, he need not have lied to me."

label: sadness
text: When the gear broke on my car.

label: disgust
text: I received a letter which was too strong for me. It said I had done something which I really didn't do.

label: shame
text: "I felt something akin to shame after a heavy night of drinking, along with waking up with a woman I had just met whose husband was an epileptic. I was later to know that she knew my mother."

label: disgust
text: Someone not responding to my criticism.

label: disgust
text: When I had just moved into my new appartment I found a ventilator in the kitchen.  I was going to clean it when I found that the drum was full of mud and slime.  I felt disgusted.

label: fear
text: I returned home late from a party last night and I felt afraid trying to anticipate the reaction of my father.

label: disgust
text: "When I attended school, our class visited an institution for mentally and physically handicapped persons. Although I tried to control my feelings, I was disgusted."

label: disgust
text: When I heard that my sister had shouted at my friend's cousin at their place.

label: guilt
text: When I did not concentrate on my studies despite my mother's help and cooperation.

label: joy
text: The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on holiday.

label: sadness
text: Death of a pet rabbit. We had to give it away because my brother became allergic to it. We gave it to a man who kept animals and lots of other animals for children to watch. We went to visit our rabbit. It was badly beaten by the other rabbits and eventually died.

label: anger
text: That was what I felt with a teacher who put down quite unreal marks.

label: guilt
text: I was to take a test and I had not made the necessary preparations until it was too late.  There were two days to go and I still had not done much.

label: joy
text: Winning a close volleyball game. (I'm on the intercollegiate team at CAL)

label: shame
text: Not having good marks like other people for homeworks.

label: joy
text: "After my vacations, one day after a lecture it occured to me to buy a rose for my mother.  We went together to a pub and my mother told me that she would be getting married next Spring.  I did not known about it and so was all the more glad."

label: joy
text: "After having finished my B.Sc, I was struggling hard to continue my studies and had taken the M.SC exam.  I was not sure that I would be selected in the written exam.  When I saw my name in the selected candidates list I was overjoyed."

label: anger
text: Being sexually assulted on a bus and noone helped (people only laughed).

label: guilt
text: After moving out of my apt. I took all the furniture and dishes and everything. It was mine but I took it all just to spite my roomies. We had a few (a lot) of disagreements. I felt guilt for moving out for the bad reasons.

label: sadness
text: When my best friend got a boyfriend. Because of this a relationship of ten years was finished abruptely.

label: shame
text: "I was eating in a very nice restaurant, when the servant asked whether I liked the food I told him that I liked it but that there was one thing which wasn't so good. The servant than worked very hard to make it good."

label: guilt
text: When my boyfriend asked me to go out with him and I refused because I wanted to go out with another guy.  I did go out and my boyfriend found out.

label: sadness
text: Losing a boyfriend for the second time to my friend. He fell in love with her. The same thing happened a few months earlier with another boyfriend.

label: fear
text: "I was rock-climbing and absailing & felt OK, but suddenly as I was going over the cliff I was hit by fear - I couldn't go on absailing down the cliff and had to be actually hauled back up it."

label: sadness
text: "I was together with my family one night, a few days after my father had died, during that conversation I expressed my displeasure because nobody understands me."

label: sadness
text: "Loneliness, being uncertain of myself in the Autumn."

label: joy
text: When I succeed in writing something I felt and doing it I felt well and very happy for being able to express to myself something that was suffocating me.

label: anger
text: Being told that I have not got a personality.

label: guilt
text: Fight with my mate after a quarrel.

label: disgust
text: I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.

label: disgust
text: "At a discussion a friend took a ""faschistic view"", what I had not expected."

label: anger
text: "Being insulted in front of my parents, and they believed other people (those insulting me)."

label: anger
text: I was angry about several drivers who showed an aggressive and dangerous driving habit.

label: disgust
text: When in my childhood we were forced to take cod-liver oil.

label: guilt
text: "One night during dinner my nephew was naughty, so I quarrelled with my  parents.   I regreted this as my nephew was only two years old and I  had to tolerate him !  The quarrel made my father think that his children  may not take care of him in the future (it was a slip of the tongue and  this made me realize that my father keeps his thoughts to himself).  I was  still very angry so I dropped my bowl and chopsticks and went to the kitchen  to drink tea and then ran to the other side of the house."

label: shame
text: "My third grade teacher caught me cheating on a spelling test. I couldn't spell Australia and she said in a loud voice something like ""We don't have cheaters in my class""."

label: disgust
text: "Seeing a friend ""making love"" to a high school girl. I accidentally was dragged into this room where the happenings had occurred. I was disgusted at the reality."

label: fear
text: I was sexually assaulted one night by a stranger.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died.

label: anger
text: When my mother rejected my boyfriend and made unfair judgements on him.

label: shame
text: I flet shameful when I learnt that I cooked Nsima which was full of lamps in it.

label: anger
text: "I went singing with a group of young people on January 6th (The three Magi), a local custom called ""star singing"". One of the girls, my girlfriend, broke the star. Being the accompanying person, I felt very angry thinking of the consequences."

label: sadness
text: Death of my grnadfather after having been in hospital for so long with cancer of the Oesophagus.

label: anger
text: I feel this feeling when I am to fill in a questionnaire or a form.

label: joy
text: I had a little cat which was very sick. As I liked it very much I went to a veterinary with it. He told me how to tend it and it really recovered its health. Everybody said that I had saved its life.

label: sadness
text: One day I heard from a friend that the boy I loved had gone out with her and not with me.

label: sadness
text: "A and I were walking along the new Asia stairway to the Chung Chi college for our lecture and I saw him with her.  He put one arm around her shoulder and laugher brightly and joyfully.  I did not dare and did not want to look, just walked by them quickly.  The interest of talking to A disappeared and I just wanted to remain silent.  But I did not want A to know and so I left him and went to F.  I should have expected this to happen."

label: disgust
text: People spitting in railway stations.

label: guilt
text: In an exam when I answered the questions with very little assurance due to insufficiet preparation.

label: shame
text: "In the past I experienced this feeling almost all the time - wherever I went, in different sutuations. I was small and I had to be taken to kindergarten, but me the fool didn't dare to tell exactly where, finally as a result I was late."

label: sadness
text: When I was a Sr. in HS. one of the class counselors died of hepatitis. She was very sensitive. She knew my shyness and drew me out to improve myself image. I missed her funeral - so I could not publically grieve. My parents didn't understand.

label: fear
text: I was alone in a cottage I often stay in.  I was woken up by a rustling sound in the middle of the night.

label: sadness
text: When I went home on holidays I found that my niece and nephew had passed away I was very sad for the children were not even sick before death but suddenly died.

label: anger
text: "About a month ago the Regional Council refused to pay my wife the due maternity benefit, because of bureaucratic reasons."

label: guilt
text: Yelled at my parents for not buying me a car like other parents.

label: joy
text: When I saw that the mark I had obtained in an exam was a good one.

label: fear
text: At night when I was alone at home (all the family members usually get together at that time) someone knocked vigorously on the door.

label: sadness
text: When my aunt passed away in early 1982.

label: anger
text: "I was accused of having done something, which I hadn't and got very angry."

label: anger
text: "Last week, my organization summoned an executive meeting and one of the executive member's pointed out a loop hole in the committee's administration.  He could not suggest any improvements, so I quarrelled with him."

label: fear
text: When I am travelling by car and have to meet an oncoming car while overtaking.

label: joy
text: "When I was in Form 4, at Secondary School, I was elected as a school Library Assistant and also the leader of Catholic Students, so I felt very joyous."

label: shame
text: "When my father found me in bed with a girl, we were deep in actioon when he entered the room."

label: disgust
text: Someone had stolen an article from a library journal.

label: joy
text: "I made the college entrance examinations for P.U.C. It was what I wanted more. When the first list came out I got frustrated. I wasn't in. When the second list came out without hopes I started to read the newspaper and my name was thre. I was in the bus and felt like crying so that everybody could hear me. The cry was hold, and 1982 became forever a mask in my life."

label: guilt
text: "Not attending school, when  am not sick - but in need of mental rest. Staff on your return query your ""sickness"" - it is easier in N.Z. to be sick, rather than confide other personal reasons etc."

label: sadness
text: "My father resigned from work, and soon after this his elder brother died.  The next day my granny died (my mother's mother).  My dad remains the only living member of his family."

label: disgust
text: Saw a selfish person doing a selfish thing.

label: joy
text: Some time ago a close relative of mine got off cheap with the worst.

label: sadness
text: When I felt powerless to help the poor or when I don't know how to.

label: sadness
text: "When I didn't succeed to enter at the University, I felt that the college entrance course sistem prejudiced me, that my integrity, and effort weren't corresponded."

label: fear
text: "I was walking from my friend's house, a few blocks from my house, when a car began to follow me. He waited I passed by it rotateed a little and stopped on my way. I changed completely my way and the car went on following me until I turned at a corner and running I hid in a garden of a house, waiting for the car to pass by. I went back home terribly afraid."

label: anger
text: "As a child - about 8 years old - walking across a paddock - being set upon by another boy who claimed it was ""his land"" - being intimidated by the boy - crying, being punched, etc."

label: guilt
text: Many years ago a friend wanted me to with her to southern Europe and I preferred to travel alone.  I felt guilty because I wanted to go on my own.

label: disgust
text: I heard a broadcasting programme about parapsychology. The people in this programme used very difficult words which I couldn't understand. They acted exaggerated without showing any feeling.

label: sadness
text: "The breaking up of a relationship.  We decided that the relationship could not carry on, so it was no surprise to me. And anyhow, I had known it would happen sooner or later."

label: anger
text: A close person lied to me.

label: anger
text: When my brother-in-law's brother stole my clothes when my brother-in-law and I had gone to cut wood for the fire.

label: fear
text: "I woke up in the middle of the night of a nightmare, I was alone, it was very quiet and very dark."

label: disgust
text: "When I watched TV and saw a performance of ""Prince"" (a popidol). Disgusting he'd better be a stallion."

label: shame
text: "My P.T. instructor also works as a masseur. He wanted to massage me, therefore I had to undress. For the first few times this was not easy for me; I got gradually used to it."

label: shame
text: "When someone I know was caught in an ""adultery"" situation."

label: guilt
text: When I fought with my sister and said that she had provoked this. She was very seriously scolded.

label: fear
text: I was in a camp and went out for a walk at night on my own.  I lost  my way and spent several hours looking for the camp.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed at myself for having shouted at my daughter because of my marital break-up and the unfair way I was treated.

label: guilt
text: I promised to join a meeting but did not turn up as I did not want to do the work.

label: joy
text: I met my friend and he gave me a wonderful present as it was my birthday.  I enjoyed having that present.

label: anger
text: Saw some young people fighting for seats on a bus.

label: guilt
text: Failed to do what I had promised.

label: sadness
text: When my father had a cerebral hemorrhage.

label: fear
text: Last Summer in Italy I was attacked by a dog.It was terrible to feel that untidy dirty dog against my naked skin.

label: anger
text: "A close friend first said he accepted an agreement, but later used that agreement as a reason for attacking me."

label: fear
text: "When I impregnated a certain girl, I thought that I would be forced to marry her or go to court."

label: shame
text: "Being with a close friend, in the city, who was involved at the present point in time in outrageous activity."

label: guilt
text: "Boyfriend doing cleaning in situation where it was my job to do it. Later snapped at him over trivial thing. He looked downcast. I felt guilty - ""he's just done all that work for me""."

label: joy
text: Bulgaria won a football match against France.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty of revealing a secret to my in-law. I told her that my brother and I had gone to disconight which is a thing my brother didn't want to let her know. Later my brother was accused of spending a night out.

label: shame
text: My teacher said that being university studets we did not have any self-initiative or self-control.

label: joy
